mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT fname, fdes, fcate, fp.fimg, fp.fid FROM FUNDING_ORDER fo, FUNDING_PRODUCT fp WHERE fo.fid = fp.fid AND sysdate < fp.FENDDATE AND fo.mid = #{mid} ORDER BY FO_ID desc ) WHERE rownum <= 4
SELECT fp.FNAME, fp.fimg, fp.FID, fo.FO_PRICE, fo.FO_CNT, fo.FO_DATE, fp.FENDDATE FROM FUNDING_ORDER fo, FUNDING_PRODUCT fp WHERE fo.FID = fp.FID AND fo.mid = #{mid} ORDER BY FO_ID DESC

SELECT fp.FNAME, fp.FIMG, fp.FID, fp.FCATE, fo.FO_DONATION, fo.FO_DATE, fp.FENDDATE FROM FUNDING_ORDER fo, FUNDING_PRODUCT fp WHERE fo.FID = fp.FID AND fo.mid = #{mid} AND FO_DONATION > 0 ORDER BY FO_ID DESC
